Sci - Cite.from sentence: To address these limitations , we introduce Sci - Cite , a new dataset of citation intents that is significantly larger , more coarse - grained and generaldomain compared with existing datasets .

three intent categories.from sentence: We consider three intent categories outlined in : BACK - GROUND , METHOD and RESULTCOMPARISON .

Citation intent.from sentence: Citation intent of sentence extractions was labeled through the crowdsourcing platform .

annotated by.from sentence: Citation contexts were annotated by 850 crowdsource workers who made a total of 29,926 annotations and individually made between 4 and 240 annotations .

sentence.from sentence: Each sentence was annotated , on average , 3.74 times .

has.from sentence: This resulted in a total 9,159 crowdsourced instances which were divided to training and validation sets with 90 % of the data used for the training set .
